title: Naissance Organic Virgin Rosehip Carrier Oil 3.4 fl.oz
features: 100% pure, Rosehip Oil certified organic by the Soil Association (license number: DJ21110).
Has been known to help with the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles and improve the appearance of your scars and stretch marks.
Oils with a high Fatty Acid content are used in dermatology for treating dry and ageing skin and to help promote tissue regeneration and heals scars.
Not tested on animals and vegan friendly. Packaged using sustainable paper and cardboard. Kind to you and the environment.
description: Scars and stretch marks: Use Rosehip Oil to improve the appearance of scars, wounds, stretch marks, eczema and burns.  Skincare: Helps moisturize and may help reduce the appearance of fine lines and wrinkles. Can be used as a gentle and effective cleanser and make-up remover.  Beauty Hack: Use in skincare for creams, lotions and balms.  Massage: Use as a massage oil base, blend with essential oils to create an aromatherapy massage oil.

As Rosehip Oil moisturizes the skin, some studies have shown that Rosehip helped certain people with skin regeneration, firming of superficial skin layers, skin conditioning, moisturizing, soothing against photo-ageing, and helped some people reduce the appearance of skin spots.  Rosehip Oil is naturally rich in the following Fatty Acids: lauric, palmitic, stearic, oleic, linoleic, and ?- linolenic. These among others help the oil with its regenerative and regulatory properties. They help promote skin elasticity and moisturize the skin. Essential Fatty Acids are very important for the skin to function correctly and help moisturize the skin. You will find many of these Fatty Acids in various cosmetic products.
